org.jerkar.tool

Class JkSlaveBuilds

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jerkar.tool.JkSlaveBuilds

  • public final class JkSlaveBuilds
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines slaves of a given master build.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<JkBuild> all()
      Returns direct and transitive slaves.
      JkSlaveBuilds and(JkDependencies dependencies)
      Returns a JkSlaveBuilds identical to this one but augmented with the BuildDependency contained in the the specified dependencies.
      JkSlaveBuilds and(java.util.List<JkBuild> slaves)
      Returns a JkSlaveBuilds identical to this one but augmented with specified slave builds.
      java.util.List<JkBuild> directs()
      Returns only the direct slave of this master build.
      void invokeDoDefaultMethodOnAll()
      Execute the doDefault on all slaves.
      void invokeOnAll(java.lang.String... methods)
      Executes the specified methods on all slaves.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • and

        public JkSlaveBuilds and(java.util.List<JkBuild> slaves)
        Returns a JkSlaveBuilds identical to this one but augmented with specified slave builds.

      • and

        public JkSlaveBuilds and(JkDependencies dependencies)
        Returns a JkSlaveBuilds identical to this one but augmented with the BuildDependency contained in the the specified dependencies.

      • directs

        public java.util.List<JkBuild> directs()
        Returns only the direct slave of this master build.

      • all

        public java.util.List<JkBuild> all()
        Returns direct and transitive slaves. Transitive slaves are resolved by invoking recursively JkBuildDependencySupport#slaves() on direct slaves.

      • invokeDoDefaultMethodOnAll

        public void invokeDoDefaultMethodOnAll()
        Execute the doDefault on all slaves.

      • invokeOnAll

        public void invokeOnAll(java.lang.String... methods)
        Executes the specified methods on all slaves.
